column4: hi guys, i just received the ubuntu 8.04 cd, what is the best file system for me to use? (it will be used only for desktop, home use, single pc internet connection to the internet)
Kernel : so which is better, reiserFS or ext3?
Kernel : ok, thanks for the tip, i'll just google reiserFS and see the diff between ext3 and reiserFS.
if you want the most support (if you ever need it) I'd go with the default ext3
